title: Navarathna Studs: Modern Heritage Earrings
materials: Faceted Red Ruby (approx. 2 carats total weight)
Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. The gold has a rich
warm tone indicative of traditional South Indian craftsmanship.
features: These earrings feature a geometric, contemporary design inspired by traditional South Indian motifs. The central ruby is square-cut and bezel-set, surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZ stones. The openwork design gives a light and airy feel, blending modern aesthetics with a touch of heritage. The setting showcases intricate metalwork with a high polish finish.
colors: The color palette is dominated by the vibrant red of the ruby
complemented by the warm yellow of the gold
and the brilliant white of the CZ stones
creating a striking and eye-catching contrast.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional occasions and modern celebrations. Ideal for a Diwali gathering
or adding a touch of elegance to your everyday wear. Suitable for festivals like Sankranti and Ugadi.
description: These earrings offer a unique blend of modern design and traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. The vibrant color combination and sparkling stones make these earrings a statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, luxurious luster.
